casebody.data:
In the Matter of B.R.C. appealed by Father and Mother. No. 591P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. Robert W. Ewing, Winston-Salem, for Father (Roger Dennis D.) Stephen M. Schoeberle, for Burke County DSS. Mary R. McKay, Morganton, for Guardian Ad Litem. Michael E. Casterline, Asheville, for Mother (Karen C.)

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th day of October 2005 by Respondent (Father) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st day of December 2005."
